duties_responsibilities.duty: Define the business capability and planning framework, aligning IT strategy with business goals.
Develop and maintain enterprise architecture and capability models in alignment with overall IT vision.
Partner with business and technology subject-matter experts to communicate business priorities and translate business requirements into technological solutions.
Maintain policies, standards, and guidelines for consistent framework application across the company.
Provide regular visibility and communicate business perspectives and IT implications to leadership.
Facilitate the sharing of architecture best practices throughout the architecture community.
Resolve problems and roadblocks as they occur.
Mentor and guide less experienced architects through onboarding and development.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree and 4 years of experience or High School Diploma and 7 years of experience in IT, Engineering, or Architecture role.
